titles.title: Susan B. Anthony Birthday Act
To honor Susan B. Anthony by celebrating her legacy on the third Monday in February.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E267)
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
2/6/2007--Introduced.
Susan B. Anthony Birthday Act - Honors Susan B. Anthony by celebrating her legacy on the third Monday in February.
